location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘R.A.F. Landing Ground and the village of Dair in the Island of Moharaq. Plan A’

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint prepared in the Land Department showing Al Dair village with properties labelled for reference and owners’ names given. Includes additions in black ink, and yellow and red crayon indicating the proposed development with approximate dimensions reported.Inscriptions:On verso in the top right-hand corner, in black ink inserted: ‘PLAN “A”’.
